TBitsPropEnum
public class AD2TBitsSync
extends java.lang.Object
implements TBitsPropEnum

This script syncs the users in AD to TBits user database.

Constructor Detail

AD2TBitsSync

public AD2TBitsSync(boolean aForce,
                    boolean aAdd,
                    boolean aUpdate,
                    boolean aTest)
The only constructor of this class.

Parameters:
aForce - Flag set if this run can be force addition/updation of entries if the count is greater than the threshold.
aAdd - Flag set if this run can insert entries into the DB.
aUpdate - Flag set if this run can update entries in the DB.
aTest - Flag set if this is a test run.
Method Detail

compareLists

public void compareLists(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,ADEntry> adTable,
                         java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,User> dbTable,
                         java.lang.String userType,
                         int userTypeId)
This method compares the entries from AD and databse.

Parameters:
adTable - Table of entries obtained from AD.
dbTable - Table of entries obtained from DB.
userType - Type of the users under comparison as string.
userTypeId - Type of the users under comparison as integer.
